channel.title: INfinance
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INfinance, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Solar stocks’ losses are nuclear’s gain, as Elon Musk takes swipe at budget bill
item.description: The Senate’s tax-and-spending bill gives a boost to nuclear power stocks, but knocks down shares of solar companies.

item.title: That money request could be an AI deepfake stealing from your account. Here’s how to protect yourself.
item.description: Financial advisers and other investment professionals must become more savvy about cybercrime.

item.title: Would you apply for a job with a nine-step hiring process — including take-home tests and case studies?
item.description: These days, many businesses are turning hiring into a hoop-jumping affair. But does that really find the best candidate?

item.title: Women are about to be tremendously wealthy. So why is it so hard to find good financial help?
item.description: The financial advice industry is still chewing up and spitting out female advisers

item.title: After platinum’s stunning 28% June surge, this chart hints at what could happen next
item.description: U.S. stocks have climbed to record heights, but platinum’s rise — on the back of a global supply shortage of the metal since 2023 — is quite impressiv...

item.title: Arabica Coffee Prices Hit Record on U.S., Colombia Tariff Spat
item.description: Arabica coffee prices hit a record level, as traders digested the withdrawal of President Trump’s threats to impose tariffs and economic sanctions on ...

item.title: DeepSeek Won't Sink U.S. AI Titans
item.description: Panic fueling the selloff of Nvidia, Broadcom and other tech giants is overblown.

item.title: Financial Services Roundup: Market Talk
item.description: Gain insight on Experian, SoFi Technologies and more in the latest Market Talks covering Financial Services.

item.title: Comex Gold, Silver Settle Lower
item.description: Gold settled 1.4% lower, down two of the past three sessions, and silver fell 2.5%, down three of the past four sessions.

item.title: Stocks Sink in Broad AI Rout Sparked by China's DeepSeek
